text:
ClassDojo | San Francisco | Full Time, On-site | https://classdojo.com

ClassDojo is looking for React-Native developers to join our team to help integrate React-Native into our massively popular Android app.

If you have Android experience and this sounds interesting, we'd love to chat with you. React-Native is easy to teach, so if you have no React-Native experience yet, but you're excited to learn something new, we'd love to chat with you too. We're looking for strong generalists and great teammates to help change the future of education.

Android and Java experience is essential for this role. We're happy to train anyone without React-Native experience at all, but we want to make sure we're working with someone who has existing experience developing on Android.

https://jobs.lever.co/classdojo/72442c2b-be83-47c6-8fdc-aec0...
